meanings.sent2: The decimations of the buffalo herds by the hunters led to scarcity.
meanings.sent3: The decimations in the storybook were so dramatic that the children gasped.
meanings.sent4: The decimations of the enemy forces in the battle turned the tide of war.

meanings.sent2: The decimations of the ancient ruins by the earthquake were irreversible.
